answers.answer: Hello you dont have to be induced its your choice. Babies come when they are ready and induction can be a very different experience (5th baby 2 previous inductions). Talk to your midwife and dont stress. X

If there is a serious medical reason, than I'd understand. Also, if you developed diabetes, that's another reason to go ahead with it as your sugar is consistently changing either way too high or way too low which could effect your unborn child. But if there isn't a real legit reason, tell your OB/Midwife you don't want to be induced....
Thanks ladies I didn't know that at all

question: Tomorrow is my due date and I really don't want to get induce. There is no sign of anything. Anybody else?
title: tomorrow is my due date?
